body:
> @sorpaas
> 
> > I removed everything I wrote which I'm listed as the primary author.
> 
> Please remove the removals of your ECIPs you wrote from this ECIP as those are not the scope of this ECIP candidate.
> 
> This is just a show of your constant blocking and interference in the ECIP process and in the work of others in ETC development.
> 
> You only confirm your malicious behavior with this action.
> 
> Again, pls remove your removals from this ECIP as it blocks its processing.

 _A significant difference between the use of a pseudonym[4] and the creation of a sockpuppet is that the sockpuppet poses as an independent third-party unaffiliated with the main account operator. Sockpuppets are unwelcome in many online communities and forums._

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sockpuppet_(Internet)
